io.delta.core

Interface Table


  • public interface Table

      static Table forPath(java.lang.String path, TableHelper helper, ScanEnvironment scanEnvironment)
      Instantiate table object for Delta Lake table at the given path.

    • Method Detail

      • forPath

        static Table forPath(java.lang.String path,
                     TableHelper helper,
                     ScanEnvironment scanEnvironment)
              throws TableNotFoundException
        Instantiate table object for Delta Lake table at the given path.
        Parameters:
        path - location where the Delta table is present. Path needs to be fully qualified.
        helper - instance of TableHelper to help the Delta core with planning and reading the table.
        scanEnvironment - Connector specific scan environment to use. This is an opaque object to Delta Core and it gets passed down to the given connector's TableHelper instance.
        Returns:
        an instance of Table representing the Delta table at given path
        Throws:
        TableNotFoundException - when there is no Delta table at the given path.

      • getSnapshotAtVersion

        Snapshot getSnapshotAtVersion(long version)
                       throws TableVersionNotFoundException
        Get the snapshot of the table with given version.
        Parameters:
        version - table version number
        Returns:
        an instance of Snapshot for given version
        Throws:
        TableVersionNotFoundException - when the version is not valid

      • getLatestSnapshot

        Snapshot getLatestSnapshot()
        Get the latest snapshot of the table.
        Returns:
        an instance of Snapshot
